review: My son had dengu like fever with warning sign and  somebody recommend me to see Dr. Vipul. Doctor listened to us patiently and checked existing test reports. He performed detailed physical examination of my son and then he explained  in detail about my son health condition and potential treatment plan. He advised all the required test and made sure that treatment is started on time and test reports are available quickly for further direction of treatment. I have came across very few such honest, friendly and down to earth doctor in my life. He shown concern about my expenses and instead of delaying treatment as some doctors do,  he advised if your son has started taking food and feeling better now  then I will advise discharge and you can go home and he can recover further at home. He is a great doctor with great professional skills and a nice human being. God bless him!!

My 6 months son was diagoned with dengue.  He was admitted in BLK Hospital under Dr. bawejas supervision, the way he deal with us explained us about the diseases was commendable. Dr. is very polite and humble and very well experienced in his field, and  gives proper time to his patients........

Dr. Vipul is a brilliant Dr. and a very supportive and helpful person. My Daughter is out of Delhi, and I am staying out of India. I called him directly, and he gave me complete consultation and medicine name over the phone without any delay. Even he didn't ask me that I am his regular patient or not? Did I pay the fee or not?  I never met such an excellent Dr. in my life. Thank you, Dr., for your support.

Regards
Kasim

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We went to Dr. Vipul Baweja for my child's cough and fever last week. What I liked the most was the way he treated our child and his explanation of the child's illness to us. *** ********* ** **** ** *** **** ****** **** ***** 

It was a very pleasant experience and we are very happy. 

Thanks Dr. Vipul Baweja.
Very good and experienced doctor. Give proper time to treat his patients. I take medication and vaccinations for both my kids from him
